name: uRTS
description:
Command infantry and tanks against your enemies in a total war between the sturdy and industrious cubes, and the fast and agile spheres. You must use your strengths and exploit your enemies weaknesses to have a chance to save your people from doom. To amass a force worthy of the name you must collect minerals spread out over the map and use them wisely.

It is destroyed or be destroyed if you lose your headquarters you lose, but if you manage to destroy that of your enemy then you will emerge victoriously.
